name: Pebmpg
description:
Pebmpg is a wonderful human being attempting to recycle everything they can to make the Earth a safe and better place. Learn to recycle from the start to the finish and maybe even become... rich?

P.S. there is typos, but hey, I think that adds to the experience. Also can you work out what each letter of Pebmpg means? The game should help you out.
